channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inside the Reluctant Fight to Ban Deepfake Ads
item.description: Without new rules, campaigns could hoodwink voters with AI-generated ads. And no one really seems to be taking the threat seriously.

item.title: Bugcrowd, the crowdsourced white-hat hacker platform, acquires Informer to ramp up its security chops
item.description: On the heels of raising $102 million earlier this year, Bugcrowd is making good on its promise to use some of that funding to make acquisitions to str...

item.title: 'Furiosa' Crystalizes the Power—and Limits—of Cli-Fi
item.description: Across four decades and five films, the Mad Max movies offer both a critique and exaltation of the very things that may well have our world motoring t...

item.title: Google to build first subsea fibre optic cable connecting Africa with Australia
item.description: Google is preparing to build what will be the first subsea fibre optic cable connecting the continents of Africa and Australia. The news comes as the ...

item.title: Drivers Are Rising Up Against Uber’s ‘Opaque’ Pay System
item.description: In London, Uber drivers are protesting a new payment system that they say makes it impossible to understand the algorithms that decide how much they g...

item.title: The new Kia EV3 will have an AI assistant with ChatGPT DNA
item.description: The Kia EV3 — the new all-electric compact SUV revealed Thursday — illustrates a growing appetite among global automakers to bring generative AI into ...

item.title: Kia EV3 Electric SUV: Range, Price, Specs, Release Date
item.description: The electric five-passenger SUV not only has an impressive maximum range, it also comes with Kia’s new generative AI voice assistant.

item.title: Bing’s API is down, taking Microsoft Copilot, DuckDuckGo and ChatGPT’s web search feature down too
item.description: Bing, Microsoft’s search engine, isn’t working properly right now. At first, we noticed it wasn’t possible to perform a web search at all. Now it seem...

item.title: 15 Best Mattresses You Can Buy Online (2024) | Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We’ve spent years testing dozens of bed-in-a-box hybrid, foam, innerspring, and certified organic mattresses.

item.title: Autonomous shipping startup Orca AI tops up with $23M led by OCV Partners and MizMaa Ventures
